The '''Gateway''' was a short roadway from the [[Great Gate of Minas Tirith]] that led into the [[Pelennor Fields]]. On [[1 May]] {{TA|3012}}<ref>{{App|Chief}}</ref> [[Aragorn]] halted a furlong from the walls of [[Minas Tirith]] at the start of the Gateway before advancing to be crowned King of [[Gondor]].<ref>{{RK|VI5}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Gateway runs for only a short distance before splitting into two roads leading towards the northern and southern gates of [[Rammas Echor]].
